releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 浅色主色调下搜索页面上文本和图标的对比度低
  2. 新增 允许自定义位于列表中的歌曲或文件的点击行为: 共 8 种模式和 2 种额外, 可自定义点击列表项目时行为
  3. 移除 选项“记住随机播放” (意义模糊，与自定义点击行为和某些特意播放冲突)
  4. 删除 选项“保护播放列表不被肆意更改” (添加了自定义点击行为后已无用)
  5. 新增 从外部播放时显示确认对话框 (如, 从文件管理器打开): 选项类似于自定义点击行为
  6. 修复 从桌面捷径播放失效
  7. 开发 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: low contrast color of the text and icon on Search Page if using a light primary color (close #43)
  2. New: allow custom click-behavior for song items or file items in list: There are 8 modes and 2 extra behaviors allowing defining what player should do when clicking item in a list. (close #12, #33 partially, #44)
  3. Remove: the option "Remember Shuffle" (It's a very vague option, causing conflict with some intended playing actions and custom click-behavior)
  4. Remove: the option "Keep the playing queue intact" (It's useless now since custom click-behavior was added)
  5. New: a confirm dialog when playing from outside (like open from file explorer): The options are similar to custom click-behavior.
  6. Fix: playing from shortcut won't work
  7. Development: clean up code

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 打开歌曲详情时卡死
  2. 修复 搜索页面的文字图标在浅色主色调下对比度问题(部分修复)
  3. 新增 歌词功能总开关
  4. 改进 崩溃界面，区分崩溃与内部错误
  5. 改进 优化菜单
  6. 开发 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: stuck when opening song details
  2. Fix: terrible contrast of the text and icon on Search Page when under light primary color (Partial Fix)
  3. Add: a general switch for all lyrics features
  4. Improve: Crash Report Page - to distinguish between crash and internal error
  5. Improve: menu
  6. Development: clean up code

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 因图片缓存配置错误而在主播放器出现的低像素图片
  2. 修复 扫描媒体对话框因加载结束前提前退出导致崩溃
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: Low pixel images appearing in the main player due to image cache policy misconfiguration
  2. Fix: Scan Media Dialog crashes if early exit before the loading finished
